TopicTitle: hello how do I get the manuevent (the tool for orbits and etc)

Articles.Content: Hi, I'm someone from Mexico (sorry for my English, I use a translator) he asked me how I unlock that tool for namas, hitting it randomly because the calculations go wrong sometimes and I want to unlock it tk

Are you talking about unlocking the Maneuver Node Tool in Career mode?

You need to upgrade 2 buildings to get the Maneuver Node editor. The first is the Tracking Station to level 2, to get Patched Conics. The second is Mission Control to level 2 to get Maneuver Nodes.

To upgrade buildings, right click them and you'll see how much they cost to upgrade, and what they currently do. If you hover your mouse over the upgrade button, it will tell you what you'll get when you upgrade the building.

Edited June 14, 2023 by Superfluous J

11 hours ago, Superfluous J said:

¿Estás hablando de desbloquear la herramienta de nodo de maniobra en el modo Carrera?

Necesitas actualizar 2 edificios para obtener el editor de nodos de maniobra. La primera es la Estación de Seguimiento hasta el nivel 2, para conseguir Cónicas Parchadas. El segundo es Mission Control al nivel 2 para obtener Nodos de maniobra.

Para actualizar edificios, haga clic con el botón derecho en ellos y verá cuánto cuesta actualizarlos y qué hacen actualmente. Si pasa el mouse sobre el botón de actualización, le dirá lo que obtendrá cuando actualice el edificio.

muchas gracias;)

5 hours ago, Fergmf said:
